trends: There have been 112 other sightings in Orlando
There were no other sightings in Orlando on or around January 22nd 2011
Summary: disc shaped ufo with flashing rotating lights on belly near orlando airport, florida
divs: Sighting DetailsI observed a ufo hovering on the spot for aboout 2 minutes, with rotating lights on its belly. It caught my attention because it was not moving along (like the rest of the airplanes). This happened about 7:05 PM, Jan 22, 2011.I reported it on facebook at 7:08, by which time it was gone. It was a large craft, with lots of lights, but the rotating (white)lights on the belly were predominantly obvious. The shape of the ufo must have been round, since the rotating lights went round and about. I was amazed that it hovered for so long. I ran to get my cellphone, took 3 pictures, but they didn't yield anything but darkness, eventhough i had gottan up on a ladder to get a higher position. I ran inside to scramble for my photo camera, but in vain. When I got back out it was gone. I wasn't afraid, or nervous, and there were no funny feelings. Howerver, I was taken by surprise and I was amazed at its audacity to hover for so long! Has anyone seen it? I would like to know.
